name: Bael'Gar
description: The monstrous molten giant Bael'Gar lumbers across the Dark Iron Highway, a stunning feat of dwarven engineering carved into Blackrock Depths. Ragnaros pulled the giant from the heart of the Firelands to guard a massive sealed door at one end of the highway. According to legend, only the Firelord and the Dark Iron clan's highest-ranking members know what lies beyond the mysterious gate.

sections.title: Overview
sections.body_text:
Bael'Gar's Hspell:462974[Giant Strike] inflicts enormous damage in a cone in front of him with every swing. Damage is split between players struck.

Hspell:463890[Rockfall] causes large boulders and small rocks to fall from the ceiling that players must avoid. Players will need to seek cover when Bael'Gar casts Hspell:463143[Molten Furnace]. Any boulders that remain when Bael'Gar casts Hspell:462972[Shatter] will inflict significant additional damage to the entire raid.

Whenever a boulder is destroyed, several Spawns of Bael'Gar are created. When a Spawn of Bael'Gar is killed, its Hspell:462968[Molten Heart] inflicts damage over time to a random player.

sections.title: Tanks
sections.body_text:
$bullet; Tanks will need to split the damage of Hspell:462974[Giant Strike] in order to survive.
$bullet; The large boulders created by Hspell:463890[Rockfall] inflict higher damage the nearer players are to the point of impact.
$bullet; Any boulders that remain when Bael'Gar casts Hspell:462972[Shatter] have the potential to make its damage lethal.
$bullet; When a boulder is destroyed several Spawns of Bael'Gar will be created and attack nearby players.

sections.title: Damage Dealers
sections.body_text:
$bullet; The large boulders created by Hspell:463890[Rockfall] inflict higher damage the nearer players are to the point of impact.
$bullet; Hspell:463143[Molten Furnace] inflicts lethal damage to players that are not behind cover.
$bullet; Any boulders that remain when Bael'Gar casts Hspell:462972[Shatter] have the potential to make its damage lethal.
$bullet; When a boulder is destroyed several Spawns of Bael'Gar will be created and attack nearby players.

sections.title: Healers
sections.body_text:
$bullet; Tanks will need to split the damage of Hspell:462974[Giant Strike] in order to survive.
$bullet; The large boulders created by Hspell:463890[Rockfall] inflict higher damage the nearer players are to the point of impact.
$bullet; Hspell:463143[Molten Furnace] inflicts lethal damage to players that are not behind cover.
$bullet; Any boulders that remain when Bael'Gar casts Hspell:462972[Shatter] have the potential to make its damage lethal.
$bullet; When Spawns of Bael'Gar are killed they will deal damage over time to a random player with Hspell:462968[Molten Heart].

sections.title: Boulder
sections.body_text: Boulders can be used to hide from Molten Furnace and release Spawns of Bael'Gar when destroyed.
